page.title: 03TOURISM IN HASTINGS
page.content: The climate has over 1800 sunshine hours per year and less than 750mm of rain. This and the abundance of Local History sites, the beauty of the landscape and good communications with London and the continent has led to the growth of tourism. Over a million people visit the town each year, but most stay for a few days. The number of hotels has decreased but many stay in camping sites near the town and come into the town for entertainment. Since the 1970's many foreign students come to Hastings to learn English. They stay with families to experience British home life. About 25,000 come each year. They come mainly from France, Germany, Sweeden, Italy and Spain.
